title: How to Get Waterfall in Pokémon X and Y

steps.headline: Get to the point of the game where you've beaten the Anistar City gym and visited Couriway Town.
Go to Route 19.
steps.description: It's located south of Couriway Town.

steps.headline: Go to the bridge on that route.
steps.description: You'll be challenged by Shauna, Tierno, and Trevor in succession.

steps.headline: Beat them, and Shauna will give you Waterfall.

text: Get to the point of the game where you've beaten the Anistar City gym and visited Couriway Town.  Go to Route 19. It's located south of Couriway Town. Go to the bridge on that route. You'll be challenged by Shauna, Tierno, and Trevor in succession. Beat them, and Shauna will give you Waterfall.
